job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer (Early Career)
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtImagine what you could do here At Apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThe Infrastructure Services Software Development team is looking for a hardworking and selfmotivated engineer to be part of a diverse fast paced and highenergy team You will design and implement tools services and applications that enable Network and Data Center operation teams to work easily You will chip in to key and innovative technology which supports major Apple applications with all the scalability and highavailability requirements that entails Collaborating with other groups to lead and deliver bestinclass products in an exciting constantly evolving environmentltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtFull stack development experienceltbrgtltbrgtStrong frontend technology stack including HTML CSS JavaScript and React UI FrameworkltbrgtltbrgtGood website design experience including developing wireframes and UXltbrgtltbrgtQuick prototyping and iterative skills with building REST services and UIFrontends for proof of conceptsltbrgtltbrgtStrong Java Programming skillsltbrgtltbrgtExperience with Spring boot based microservicesltbrgtltbrgtExperience with NoSQL databasesltbrgtltbrgtExperience writing effective unit tests and debugging skillsltbrgtltbrgtNice to have good troubleshooting production issuesltbrgtltbrgtBuilding applications and products with scale and performance in mindltbrgtltbrgtCustomer focused and agileltbrgtltbrgtWe seek a self starter forwardthinking person with strong leadership capabilitiesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtYou will use your technical expertise to implement new features and improvements You should be comfortable with rapidlyevolving designs and requirements and have excellent communication skills Success depends on influencing other teams that run Apples infrastructure and datacenter operations You will have a sense of customerfocused solutions that just work and keep this in mind at every stage of development You will articulate ideas clearly within our team and collaborate with other organizations at
